titles.title: Voter Citizenship Verification Act

To amend the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 to require an individual to provide proof that the individual is a citizen of the United States as a condition of registering to vote in elections for Federal office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 4/20/2004--Introduced. Voter Citizenship Verification Act - Amends the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 to require an individual to provide proof that the individual is a citizen of the United States as a condition of registering to vote in elections for Federal office. Amends the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require proof of citizenship at the polling place for an individual to vote in elections for Federal office.
